atDirectives.name: @tailwind
atDirectives.description: Use the @tailwind directive to insert Tailwind's base, components, utilities and variants styles into your CSS.

atDirectives.name: @apply
atDirectives.description: Use the @apply directive to inline any existing utility classes into your own custom CSS.

atDirectives.name: @layer
atDirectives.description: Use the @layer directive to tell Tailwind which layer your custom styles belong to.

atDirectives.name: @variants
atDirectives.description: Use the @variants directive to generate utilities for different variants like hover, focus, etc.

atDirectives.name: @responsive
atDirectives.description: Use the @responsive directive to create responsive variants.

atDirectives.name: @screen
atDirectives.description: The @screen directive allows you to create media queries at breakpoints specified in your theme.
